sentences.en: Do you want a written acknowledgement?
sentences.cn: 你需要我书面确认收到吗？

sentences.en: Farling smiled in acknowledgement and gave a bow.
sentences.cn: 法林微笑示意，又躬身行了个礼。

sentences.en: He appreciated her acknowledgement of his maturity.
sentences.cn: 她承认他的成熟，他对此心怀感激。

sentences.en: He gave Sabrina a quick nod of acknowledgement.
sentences.cn: 他朝萨布里娜快速点点头,示意看到了她.

sentences.en: He smirked in acknowledgement of their uncouth greetings, and sat down.
sentences.cn: 他皮笑肉不笑地接受了他的粗鲁的招呼, 坐了下来.

sentences.en: I bowed my head in acknowledgement of guilt.
I received a gracious letter of acknowledgement.
sentences.cn: 我收到一封有礼貌的感谢信.

sentences.en: In acknowledgement whereof I have hereunto affixed my signature.
sentences.cn: 下面是我的签名,确认我的誓言.

sentences.en: Lord muttered an acknowledgement and allowed his hand to be shaken.
sentences.cn: 洛德嘴里咕噜一声,表示知道了,听任那人握住了自己的手.

sentences.en: Mitzi nodded a perfunctory acknowledgement as her glass was filled.
sentences.cn: 杯子被倒满时米芝敷衍性地点头示意。

sentences.en: Please sign the acknowledgement of receipt.
sentences.cn: 请您在送达回证上签名盖章.

sentences.en: She fancies herself to be above us and walked by without an acknowledgement.
sentences.cn: 她自以为了不起,不把我们放在眼里,走过时连招呼都不打.

sentences.en: Their replies were no more than grunts of acknowledgement.
sentences.cn: 他们所谓的回答不过是表示承认的咕哝罢了。

sentences.en: These flowers are a small acknowledgement of your great kindness.
sentences.cn: 这些花是用来对您的恩惠略表谢意的.

sentences.en: This report is an acknowledgement of the size of the problem.
sentences.cn: 这个报告承认了问题的严重性。

sentences.en: We are sending you a small sum of money in acknowledgement of your help.
sentences.cn: 为感谢你的帮助我们寄上一小笔钱.

words.tran_cn: 承认；确认（acknowledge的过去式和过去分词）；答谢
承认；答谢；报偿；告知已收到

trans.tran_cn: 承认，（公开）致谢，打招呼的表示，收件复函
trans.tran_en: the act of admitting or accepting that something is true
